title: Jinx Q sound
body: You guys fixed Jinx's W and hair animation of Ambitious Elf Jinx but her Q sound is still bugged

replies.body: There was a comment on twitter from Riot LoveStrut that this will be fixed in 8.2 which is the patch on the PBE now.
That's correct - just verified in-client that it's in and good to go on PBE. :)
